item.description:
Join us for the second in a series of Scooter "Show and Tell" events.

Scooter owners: Polish up your pet and show em off!

Scooter rider wannabes: Come with your questions and get answers! See real live scooters!

We will be having breakfast at the hotel and then going outside for "show and tell" For those members who wish to go for a ride, we will be departing in two groups for rides at 12:30. (A 30-40mph group and a 45-65mph group), details to follow.

Hope to see you there!

Paul

Rain/Snow date 4/26
item.how_to_find_us: Look for helmets! join us inside at the Riverbend Restaurant for Brunch
item.why: See different scooters and talk to the owners
item.name: Scooter "Show and Tell" Brunch
